title: Is a Damaged Fukushima Nuclear Reactor About to Fall Into the Ocean?
subtitle: Tepco, the company responsible for clean-up after 2011 Fukushima disaster, found high levels of radiation inside one of the crippled reactors, but no reactor is about to collapse into the ocean.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A damaged nuclear reactor at Fukushima Daiichi is about to fall into the ocean.
